Package com.nokia.maps.component.touch

The touch package offers a framework for creating MapComponents which react to pointer touch events.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CenteringComponent
    This class defines a MapComponent which checks to see if a MapObject can be found underneath the touch hit area and then alters the centre of the map to move the MapObject to the centre of the screen.
    ContextMenuComponent
    This class defines a MapComponent which associates a context menu to a MapObject.
    InfoBubbleComponent
    This class defines a MapComponent which associates an infobubble to a MapObject.
    TouchComponent
    This class offers an abstract base class for MapComponents which wish to handle touch events and gesture actions.
    TouchEventHandler
    This class provides a framework for handling touch and gesture events.
    VisibleTouchComponent
    This class is an abstract base class for MapComponents which are visible and respond to touch.

Package com.nokia.maps.component.touch Description

The touch package offers a framework for creating MapComponents which react to pointer touch events. The components may or may not have an associated visual element.
